problem_text_cn: 如图,在平行四边形ABCD中,AE=EB,AF=2,则FC的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, AE = EB, AF = N_0, then the value of FC is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=CD,AB∥CD,∴∠CDE=∠AED,∠DCA=∠CAB,∴△AEF∽△CDF,∴AF:CF=AE:CD,∵AE=EB,∴AE=\frac{1}{2}AB,∴AE=\frac{1}{2}CD,即AE:CD=1:2,∵AF=2,∴CF=4,故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行四边形的性质相似三角形的判定与性质,根据已知得出△AEF∽△CDF是解题关键．
